data_table.description: Respiratory Questionnaire, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE1
variable.description: A. Cough. Q1. Coughing During Winter [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE1A
variable.description: A. Cough. Q1a. Coughing on most days out of the week [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE1B
variable.description: A. Cough. Q1b. Years with cough [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE2
variable.description: A. Cough. Q2. Coughing during rest of year more or equal to 4 days per week [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE2A
variable.description: A. Cough. Q2a. Coughing on most days per week for more or equal 3 months [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE2B
variable.description: A. Cough. Q2b. Years of coughing most days more than 3 months per year [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE3
variable.description: A. Cough. Q3. Coughing up phlegm or sputum [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE4
variable.description: B. Wheezing. Q4. Have you ever had wheezing or whistling in your chest? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE4A
variable.description: B. Wheezing. Q4a. Have you had this wheezing or whistling when you did not have a cold? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE4B
variable.description: B. Wheezing. Q4b. At about what age did the wheezing or whistling start? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE4C
variable.description: B. Wheezing. Q4c. Still has wheezing or whistling [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE4D
variable.description: B. Wheezing. Q4d. How many years has it been since you last experienced wheezing or whistling? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE4E
variable.description: B. Wheezing. Q4e. Have you ever had an attack of wheezing that has made you feel short of breath? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE4F
variable.description: B. Wheezing. Q4f. Wheezing attack in past 12 months [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE5
variable.description: C. Breathlessness. Q5. Are you disabled from walking by any condition other than heart or lung disease? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE6
variable.description: C. Breathlessness. Q6. Are you troubled by shortness of breath when hurrying on the level or walking up a slight hill? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE7
variable.description: C. Breathlessness. Q7. Do you have to walk slower than people of your age on the level because of breathlessness? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE8
variable.description: C. Breathlessness. Q8. Do you ever have to stop for breath when walking at your own pace on the level? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE9
variable.description: C. Breathlessness. Q9. Do you ever have to stop for breath after walking about 100 yards (or after a few minutes) on the level? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE10
variable.description: C. Breathlessness. Q10. Are you too breathless to leave the house or breathless on dressing or undressing? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE11
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q11. Has a doctor ever told you that you had emphysema or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (also called COPD)? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE11A
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q11a. Age when informed of emphysema or COPD [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE11B
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q11b. Currently have emphysema or COPD [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE12
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q12. Informed of chronic bronchitis [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE12A
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q12a. Age when informed of chronic bronchitis [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE12B
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q12b. Currently have chronic bronchitis [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE13
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q13. Breathing problems before age 16 [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE14
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q14. Have you ever had asthma? [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE14A
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q14a. Asthma confirmed by doctor [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE14B
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q14b. Age asthma started [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE14C
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q14c. Currently have asthma [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE14D
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q14d. Age asthma stopped [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE15
variable.description: D. Conditions. Q15. Allergies that trigger asthma symptoms [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE16
variable.description: E. Allergies. Q16. Experienced hay fever, nasal allergies, or allergic rhinitis [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE16A
variable.description: E. Allergies. Q16a. Experienced hay fever, nasal allergies, or allergic rhinitis. Experienced in past 12 months [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE17
variable.description: E. Allergies. Q17. Problems with sneezing/runny nose/blocked nose without cold/flu [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE18
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q18. Another person sleeps in same room [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE19
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q19. Snoring frequency [Respiratory Questionnaire]
variable.value: Always or almost always (6-7 nights a week)

variable.name: RSE20
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q20. Sleep Apnea Frequency [Respiratory Questionnaire]
variable.value: Always or almost always (6-7 nights a week)

variable.name: RSE21
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q21. Hours of sleep in past month [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE23A
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q23a. Age sleep apnea diagnosed [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE23B
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q23b. Treatment for sleep apnea [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE23C1
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q23c1. What type of treatment did you receive for sleep apnea? CPAP [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE23C2
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q23c2. What type of treatment did you receive for sleep apnea? BILEVEL [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE23C3
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q23c3. What type of treatment did you receive for sleep apnea? Oral device [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE23C4
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q23c4. What type of treatment did you receive for sleep apnea? Surgery [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE23C5
variable.description: F. Sleep. Q23c5. What type of treatment did you receive for sleep apnea? Other [Respiratory Questionnaire]

variable.name: RSE0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q0a. Year of completion date [Respiratory Questionnaire]
